name: Perl: Avoid code lines longer than 80 characters in Subroutines
description: Avoid Subroutines with lines longer than 80 characters
output: This report lists all Subroutines with lines longer than 80 characters. It provides the following information: Subroutine full name, number of long lines
rationale: For better readability and portability (printers, terminals, IDE), Artifacts should not have lines longer than 80 characters.
